```{r}

library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
#| label: loading-datasets
#| message: false
#| eval: false

#loading datasets childcare_costs and counties from tidytuesday

childcare_costs <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2023/2023-05-09/childcare_costs.csv')

counties <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2023/2023-05-09/counties.csv')


#loading dataset expenditures from tidytuesday

expenditures <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-09-15/kids.csv')

#loading dataset scores
scores <- read_csv("data/scores.csv")

#loading us map 
us_states <- map_data("state")

```

Code for us_states from Kieran Healy: `https://socviz.co/maps.html#map-u.s.-state-level-data`
